name: Deep Sea Whale Mechanic
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for ludum dare 48.

Try to reach a depth of 5000m with the help of the Deep Sea Whale Mechanic, who upgrades your submarine. The whale will take all your jelly and tentacles in exchange for money! 

Controls:

Arrows - move

Z - shoot

1,2,3,4,5 - sell
